alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 1:05PM MST until December 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SNOWY AND WINDY CONDITIONS CONTINUE... .Gusty winds and snow will produce difficult travel conditions this afternoon and evening over portions of western and south central South Dakota, the Black Hills, and northeastern Wyoming. Falling and blowing snow will cause reduced visibility and slippery road conditions as the snow gradually moves from west to east across the area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Falling and blowing snow. Snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Bennett County, Todd County, Mellette County, Jackson County, Oglala Lakota County and Tripp County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp
